prd.title: Daily Event Insurance - Call Center VA Implementation

overview.description: B2B embedded insurance platform enabling gyms, climbing facilities, and rental businesses to offer same-day coverage to their members

tasks.title: Create custom fields in GHL
tasks.description: Create Contact-level fields: business_type, business_size, partner_id, partner_tier, integration_method, integration_status, lead_source

tasks.title: Create call-center specific fields
tasks.description: Add fields: preferred_contact_time, primary_contact_role, call_status, last_contact_attempt_at, next_follow_up_at, do_not_call_reason

tasks.title: Set up lead status tags
tasks.description: Create tags: Lead - New Inquiry, Lead - Contacted, Lead - Qualified, Lead - Demo Scheduled, Lead - Demo Completed, Lead - Proposal Sent, Lead - Negotiating

tasks.title: Set up call outcome tags
tasks.description: Create tags: Call - Left Voicemail, Call - No Answer, Call - Call Back Requested, Call - Not Interested, Call - Bad Fit, Call - Number Invalid, Call - Do Not Call

tasks.title: Set up partner and business type tags
tasks.description: Create Partner Status tags and Business Type tags per documentation

tasks.title: Create Partner Acquisition pipeline
tasks.description: Stages: New Lead (10%), Contacted (20%), Demo Scheduled (40%), Qualified (60%), Proposal Sent (75%), Negotiating (85%), Won (100%), Lost (0%)

tasks.title: Create Partner Onboarding pipeline
tasks.description: Stages: Signed Contract, Portal Setup, Integration, Testing, Launch Ready, Active

tasks.title: Create Welcome Series emails (5)
tasks.description: Templates: Thank You, Demo Reminder, Value Proposition, Social Proof, Final Check-In

tasks.title: Create Onboarding emails (6)
tasks.description: Templates: Welcome, Portal Access, Integration, Integration Check, Launch Ready, First Week

tasks.title: Create Initial Outreach emails (5)
tasks.description: Templates: Introduction, Value Proposition, Social Proof, Problem Solution, Final Touch

tasks.title: Build New Partner Inquiry workflow
tasks.description: Trigger on form submit, add tags, pipeline stage, send welcome email/SMS, create task, internal notification

tasks.title: Build New Inquiry Call Task workflow
tasks.description: Extension of Partner Inquiry workflow - set next_follow_up_at, notify call queue for SLA tracking

tasks.title: Build Missed SLA Follow-Up workflow
tasks.description: Trigger when task overdue or next_follow_up_at passed, alert internal team

tasks.title: Build Onboarding Sequence workflow
tasks.description: 10-day automated sequence triggered by Partner - Signed Contract tag

tasks.title: Build Initial Outreach workflow
tasks.description: 5-email sequence over 14 days for cold outreach

tasks.title: Create all forms (5)
tasks.description: Partner Inquiry, Partner Application, Integration Request, Partner Feedback, Support Request

tasks.title: Configure GHL Phone System
tasks.description: Assign phone numbers, enable call recording, configure voicemail greeting, set VA permissions

tasks.title: Document Call Disposition mappings
tasks.description: Create disposition -> tag/pipeline action mapping table for VA reference

tasks.title: End-to-end workflow testing
tasks.description: Test all scenarios: new lead journey, partner onboarding, cold outreach, call flows

tasks.title: Generate hero image
tasks.description: Main hero image for landing page

tasks.title: Generate partner type icons (4)
tasks.description: Icons for Gym, Climbing, Rental, Adventure

tasks.title: Generate process step illustrations (3)
tasks.description: Step 1, 2, 3 visual illustrations

tasks.title: Generate call support visuals
tasks.description: Phone/headset icon, 'Talk to a specialist' badge for CTA areas

tasks.title: Generate OG image and favicon
tasks.description: Social sharing image and app icons

tasks.title: Generate trust badges (3)
tasks.description: Trust/credibility badges

tasks.title: Generate email headers (2)
tasks.description: Header images for email templates

tasks.title: Optimize and upload all images
tasks.description: Compress for web, upload to /public/images/

tasks.title: Remove old Wizard of AI images
tasks.description: Clean up legacy assets

tasks.title: Update hero section copy
tasks.description: Revenue-focused messaging, add 'Talk to an onboarding specialist' CTA

tasks.title: Add click-to-call and callback CTAs
tasks.description: Mobile click-to-call link, 'Request a Call' form with preferred_contact_time

tasks.title: Update footer and GetStarted sections
tasks.description: Add urgency/social proof, phone contact options

tasks.title: Update image imports in components
tasks.description: Reference new images after upload

tasks.title: Mobile responsiveness testing
tasks.description: Test all breakpoints

tasks.title: Cross-browser testing
tasks.description: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge

tasks.title: Accessibility check
tasks.description: Alt text, contrast, keyboard navigation

tasks.title: Set up Vercel project
tasks.description: Configure deployment, environment variables

tasks.title: Connect custom domain
tasks.description: DNS configuration, SSL verification

tasks.title: Set up Google Analytics 4
tasks.description: Install GA4, configure events for phone clicks

tasks.title: Embed GHL forms on website
tasks.description: Partner Inquiry and Request a Call forms

tasks.title: Test form â†’ GHL workflow integration
tasks.description: End-to-end lead capture testing

tasks.title: Test inbound phone flows
tasks.description: Test main number during business hours, after hours voicemail, missed call tasks

tasks.title: Test call-to-lead mapping
tasks.description: Verify contacts created, tags applied, recordings visible for website and direct calls

tasks.title: Configure GHL dashboards
tasks.description: Set up metrics: inquiries/day, time-to-first-call, calls per VA, demo booked rate, pipeline conversion

tasks.title: Final QA checklist
tasks.description: Full site and workflow review

tasks.title: Create Partner FAQ document
tasks.description: FAQs aligned with call scripts: how coverage works, liability, integrations, staff training

tasks.title: Create VA Call Playbook
tasks.description: Daily workflow, call flows for key scenarios, standard notes template, disposition rules, DNC handling

tasks.title: Define SLA policy
tasks.description: New inquiry: 15-30min, Missed call: 1hr, Warm follow-ups: 2 business days

tasks.title: Create compliance guidelines
tasks.description: Phrases to avoid, escalation to licensed agents, disclaimers, call recording consent

tasks.title: Document GHL admin procedures
tasks.description: How to manage users, permissions, workflows

tasks.title: Create Call QA & Coaching process
tasks.description: Sample 3-5 calls per VA/week, scorecard template, feedback loop

tasks.title: Record Loom walkthrough
tasks.description: Optional video training

slaPolicy.warmFollowUps: 1 touch per 2 business days until closed

actions: Set tag: Call - Do Not Call
